channel.title: THEHACKERSLABS on Pylon
channel.description: Recent content in THEHACKERSLABS on Pylon

item.title: BocataCalamares
item.description: Enumeration Vamos a empezar con un escaneo nmap: ┌──(pylon㉿kali)-[~/…/pylon/THL/BocataCalamares/nmap] └─$ nmap -p- --open -sS --min-rate=5000 -n -Pn -vvv 192.168.44.130 Starting Nmap 7.

item.title: Fruits
item.description: Enumeration Vamos a empezar con un buen escaneo nmap: ┌──(pylon㉿kali)-[~/…/pylon/THL/Fruits/nmap] └─$ nmap -p- --open -sS --min-rate=5000 -n -Pn -vvv 192.168.231.129 Starting Nmap 7.
